actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that health benefit plans of certain Government employees shall not contain any prohibitions relating to the provision of abortions.

summary.text: Requires health insurance contracts provided through the Government to Federal employees to cover the costs associated with an abortion.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that health benefit plans of certain Government employees shall not contain any prohibitions relating to the provision of abortions.
